review: Transmission of music data at rates faster than the speed of light seemed convenient, until I realized I was hearing the music before I actually wanted to play it.  Apparently Denon forgot how accustomed most of us are to unidirectional time and the general laws of physics.  I tried to get used to this effect but hearing songs play before I even realized I was in the mood for them just really screwed up my preconceptions of choice and free will.  I'm still having a major existential hangover.Would not purchase again.
productTitle: Denon AKDL1 Dedicated Link Cable (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
